snippet.title: Familiar Travels | Final Game Trailer | A Visual Novel Game Trailer
snippet.description:
The Official Final Game Trailer for Familiar Travels - A Visual Novel Game Trailer

This game was created as a love letter to the furry fandom, and quickly expanded to become a deconstruction of relationships, a game about forging genuine connections, and the struggles of finding your identity in a community that you don't entirely fit into. If you're looking for a way to kill some time, or an experience that will connect with you on a deep emotional level, check out Familiar Travels. This is a game not just for furries, but for anybody who is part of an internet community, or anybody who wants to explore the more nuanced and complicated aspects of relationships.

#furry #furryfandom #familiartravels

Check us out on Itch.io and Steam here:
https://halftonestudios.itch.io/familiartravels
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1142250/
